    core - package core
     
    createAllGUIs() - Static method in class gui.Board
    Creates the main frame, and it's panel with a cardlayout.
    createEndScreen() - Static method in class gui.Board
    Creates the screen that shows when the game ends The panel gets buttons with actionlisteners added to it The panel also has a panel, which receives a property so it can be manipulated later
    createGamePanel(String) - Static method in class gui.Board
    The screen where the game will be played gets created The game panel gets the BoardClickListener that has been created in a seperate class
    createMenuButton(String) - Static method in class gui.Board
    Generic button creator for the gamemode selecting screen
    createStartScreen() - Static method in class gui.Board
    Creates the screen where the user chooses which mode to play The screen - startPanel - gets assigned a title and another panel - modePanel The latter panel gets assigned buttons, and those buttons get actionlisteners
